overview:
Ing. Jodal is a Systems Engineer graduated in the School of Engineering of the University of the Republic (Uruguay). He has been a Professor at the Catholic University Dámaso Antonio Larrañaga (Uruguay). He has delivered numerous courses within his specialty field of study in Brazil from 1984 to 1989.

From 1984 to 1986 he has provided consulting services in Database and application development projects to several of the largest Brazilian and Uruguayan companies.

He is the co-author of the GeneXus project. Together with Ing. Breogán Gonda, Ing. Jodal has been distinguished by the National Academy of Engineering (Uruguay) with the National Award of Engineering 1995, because of the GeneXus project.

His areas of research include: Databases, Artificial Intelligence, automatic application development methodology and interaction between the business and information technology worlds.

Ing. Jodal is Founding Partner and Director of GeneXus-Artech and GeneXus Consulting in Uruguay and GeneXus USA, Artech de México, Artech do Brasil and GeneXus Japan Inc. in their respective countries.
